name: Lost Soul (Zero Studio)
description:
Discover your past, or be lost forever ...

Follow the story of a lonely ghost and his quest to rediscover the past. Solve puzzles by possessing a variety of objects while dodging the relentless ghost hunter. Resolve your cloudy past so that you may finally rest in peace ... or forever be a lost and forgotten soul.

Featuring ...
  • RPG Puzzle Survival Horror Gameplay
  • Mysterious and nerve-tingling background music
  • Simple & Intuitive control scheme
  • Adjustable graphics options
  • Average Playtime: 20-30 minutes
